CC871A42E9E940CB9E1631EDD58BE5D2.description: Identify potential fire hazards and prevention procedures in underground mines, well sites and processing plants.

27C4E90BD59348FCB834D6113A8471FC.description: Discuss the hierarchy of controls including elimination, substitution, engineering, administrative controls and PPE.

D92958AFC9094038ACC32CA5D60194F1.description: Describe the use of personal protective equipment (PPE) (e.g., masks, ear plugs, safety goggles and footwear) for respiratory, hearing, sight and body protection.

4E3AD72996B948DDB9B7AF6D847490FE.description: Explore the safety regulations, procedures, equipment and personnel at local or regional mining, drilling and power generation sites.

7EC158FE45234162A74E6B0BD311EC35.description: Investigate ways to mitigate damage to equipment because of unsafe work activities or environments.

9412808C5FE04088862C57D284E5F3C0.description: Describe ways to reduce personal injury because of unsafe work activities (e.g., lifting heavy objects, travelling underground and blasting) or environments (e.g., working around large and noisy equipment, radiation exposure and working underground).

5899A3B6E30F4088894753C472FF85A1.description: Examine the reliance on basic safety policies when using advanced technology.

A4EEA84D66C240BCA879A49755EF1779.description: Explain how the Globally Harmonized System (GHS) is used.

EA83587406BE495395D6E242C06F4BA6.description: Explore the use of zero energy state and lockout tagout features of equipment.

A4E9631755DE41E1B0261C227A8D33FA.description: Analyze the historical safety statistics on injuries in the energy and mining industries.

54D4D561A25E44DD8CE062DCA16AA491.description: Explore the safety standards of the energy and mining industries.

0D200A19FDED424CBE95A8F26AFA2306.description: Discuss local, national and global current events in the energy and mining sectors.

7F5827EDF7A14C0CBDD9F840CAFE0F68.description: Identify local energy and mineral companies.

6069786F1FBD4797B72AD578204EECCF.description: Explore recruitment and retention strategies for diverse groups in the energy and mining industries.

85472835AE2046EEB9002F9746BC6CD4.description: Investigate the history of the hiring practices in the energy and mining sectors to include diverse groups (e.g., women, Indigenous peoples and immigrants).

D28A6F7DE81F490EBC270737736809AF.description: Explore the impact of the energy and mining on society (e.g.,communication technology, manufacturing, agriculture and consumer products and services).

9EB956FCFB124721AC810DA3BF676BCF.description: Describe the main stages of the exploration, mining and drilling processes.

EFB5BCA41D9042C48B60A74544B0F270.description: Explain the fundamental differences between matter and energy.

E66E1081EF0F4E07A2CECFAB07EA5D7C.description: Explore the principles of energy release, conversion and utilization.

0E83D22D919247368205D4A53D9BF47D.description: Examine the diversity and impact of Saskatchewan's energy and mining sectors.
